result.markdown:
--- title: "Team Project" date: "February 14, 2023" format: html: toc: true toc-location: right number-sections: true editor: visual --- This is an example of the team project web-page.
## US county map of climate change belief in 2018   __Estimated percentage who think that global warming is caused mostly by human activities__ ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} cc_belief_county <- read_csv( 'https://bcdanl.github.io/data/cc_belief_county.csv' ) ``` ::: ::: {.cell fig.asp='0.75'} ```{.r .cell-code} legend_title <- "" ggplot(data = cc_belief_county) + geom_polygon(aes(long, lat, group = group, fill = human2018), color = "grey", size = 0.1) + coord_map("bonne", parameters = 41.6) + scale_fill_gradient(legend_title, low='#0057e7', high='#d62d20') + theme_map() + theme(legend.position="right") + labs(caption = "Data source: Yale Climate Change Communication") ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](teamproj0_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=672} ::: :::
